raw_body: SHAKTHEVELL – T. (Ex HNB). It is with heavy hearts & profound sadness that we announce the passing away of T. SHAKTHEVELL (Ex HNB). Beloved husband of Manjula,​ loving father of Vaenthaan (UK),​ son of late Thambiayah & Rasaloginy,​ son-in-law of late S. Arulanantham,​ Paremeswary Arulanantham,​ loving brother of Sakthiyabama,​ Gnanamalar,​ Gnanavel. Funeral Sunday the 6th August at General Cemetery,​ Negombo. Cortege leaves residence,​ No. 68,​ Main Street,​ Negombo (Opposite General Post Office).048163
